translated: Dawn takes the pseudonym George (without -s, in imitation of the English) Sand (remember Jules Sandeau her lover) in 1832, on the occasion of his first novel, Indiana.
original: Aurore prend le pseudonyme de George (sans -s, à l'imitation des Anglais) Sand (souvenir de Jules Sandeau son amant) en 1832, à l'occasion de son premier roman, Indiana.
